site.name: Freedom Crate Co.
site.description: Freedom Crate Co. builds handcrafted wooden military-style ammo boxes and range crates. Veteran-inspired, Florida-built, and made for real use at the range or as patriotic display pieces.

products.name: Freedom Crate Classic — Branch Collection
products.shortDescription: Handcrafted wooden military-style ammo box with optional U.S. branch stencil, lockable hardware, and free U.S. shipping.
useCases: gift for veterans and service members

products.name: Rangemaster 400
products.shortDescription: Compact, stackable wooden range box with optional Armor Core interior liner or Battle Guard exterior PolyShield.

shipping.policy: Free U.S. shipping on ammo boxes. Most orders ship within 1–3 business days and arrive within 2–6 business days.
shipping.returns: Most non-custom items may be returned within 14 days of delivery (customer pays return shipping). Custom-stenciled crates are generally non-returnable unless damaged in transit.

projects.name: Final Salute Project
projects.description: An initiative to honor recently retired U.S. veterans with handcrafted keepsake crates.

projects.name: Monthly Veteran Box Giveaway
projects.description: A monthly giveaway where a nominated veteran receives a custom Freedom Crate Co. box.

privacy.summary: Freedom Crate Co. only collects the information needed to fulfill orders, respond to messages, and verify giveaway entries. Information is never sold or traded.
